questions.quote: Hey Jerry, th...  George, you decided to get a rug! Good for you, Jack!
What are you talking? Jeffrey works for the parks department!
"Dear Henry, last night with you was bliss. I fear my.. orgasm  has left me a cripple. I don't how how I shall ever get back to work..  I love you madly, John.  P.S. Loved the cabin."
No. I need a guy that can rig a Frogger machine so that I can move it without losing power, 'cause I have the high score. H-hello?
Okay, I'm done. I'll be back in the morning, when he's close to finish with his story.
Elaine, I need you to do me a big favor. I need you to go down to the Diplomat's Club and meet Bridget for me. I'm going to be late.
Pst.  Wilkinson's got a bite on a new one. Petramco Corp. Out of, uh Springfield. I think. They're about to introduce some sort of a robot butcher.
No, I'll be seeing you.  "Good morning, good morning.."  Have you ever gotten up in the morning and felt it's great to be alive? That every breath is a gift of sweet life from above?
Yes, because my previous vomit was also June 29th... 1972. That's why during the '80 vomit, I was yelling to George: "Can you believe it? I'm vomiting on June 29th again."
What does he want from me? I didn't do anything. See this is all Elaine's fault. She took off to Europe with his psychiatrist. He probably can't get his medication. Now I got some nut after me.
